participant_1.background:
I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.
my mother is in the hospital.
my dog s name is wonwon.

i really like watching star trek.

participant_2.background:
I loved playing with my dog as a child.
I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going good so far, thanks! I'm just watching Star Trek: The Next Generation.
Oh, I love Star Trek! What is your favorite episode?
It's hard to pick just one favorite episode, but I really like "The Inner Light."
That's a great one! I also really like "Measure of a Man."
Yes, that's another good one! I'm also a big fan of "The Drumhead."
Those are all great episodes! What other TV shows do you like?
I also like The Office, Parks and Recreation, and The Good Place.
Oh, I love all of those shows too! I'm also a big fan of The Big Bang Theory and How I Met Your Mother.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of Seinfeld.
Oh, I love Seinfeld! We should watch it together sometime!
That would be fun! I have all the seasons on DVD.
Great! We can watch it this weekend.
Sounds good! I'll bring the popcorn.
